content.detailedDescription: My common-law wife went outside for a cigarette in our backyard around 11 pm wednesday night august 17,2011. within 2 mins of her being outside she called for me very excitedly to come outside quickly. i went outside, looked up and saw an extremely bright object slowly traveling eastward over our house. she thought it was simply a satellite until it brightened like the full moon and called me out. the way the light shined was periodically in a diamond shape or cross shape. it was completely silent. i ran inside the house to get my binoculars. i came out and pointed my binoculars and could see the object was a sphere. oddly, it did not have wings or have any flashing lights. the light appeared to emit from within the object. i decided to run back in for my android phone to record it (all the while my wife was outside the entire time observing). i came back out and saw the object start wobbling or zigzaging but remaining in it's original path (the object was moving in a relatively constant, slow speed). i held up my phone to start recording but the object began to dim. i pointed my binoculars to view the object and could see the light dimming within. seconds before it disappeared it turned a reddish colour. i could see the outline much better but the object seemed to get smaller. i could still see the object but then it disappeared as i had it viewed in my binoculars. we went through all possibilities of what it could of been and it was not an asteroid, shooting star, plane, helicopter, balloon, latern, lightning, space debris, etc(i have an extensive aviation and astronomy background). the feeling we felt was anxiety and excitedness. we did not want it to go for some reason as we watched it. we had an awstruck emotion toward it. it felt as if the object was purposeful in it's movements and was deliberate in it's actions. we could not stop thinking about it for a long while after.
content.summary: In our back yard and saw the object slowly fly over our house and disappear

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday, 4pm, march 1996, canyon road, portland or. friend and i are walking a three-acre parcel that is about to be clear cut for housing. we are hugging each tree good-bye.
something makes us stop and turn to the west -- it's a humming and a presence. time stops cold. we are out of normal reality. suddenly, out of nowhere, a giant pulsing, humming, beeping, shape-shifting blue orb races  towards us. it looks like it traveled right through my house, three stories from the ground, and the orb is bigger than the house. it's headed straight for us. i'm dumbstruck, but i face it square, unafraid. it's like it has a message for us about the trees and what we're doing. in a weird way, the appearance of the orb somehow doesn't surprise me, once the pause in time-space takes place.
it zooms right at us, goes right through us and disappears into the trees. we're just sort of stunned. "what was that?" "did you see that?" "i'm so glad i had a witness."
we never noticed any objects in the sky before or after.
content.summary: House-size pulsing blue orb appeared from nowhere and went right through me and witness

content.detailedDescription: At the time i and two others were driving north on ohio route 43 between kent and streetsboro. as we came over a hill, we spotted six or seven orange lights in the sky ahead of us in what appeared to be a zig-zag pattern. it should be noted that this zig-zag pattern was laid out vertically and not horizontally from our point of view. at first i thought they were streetlights, but it quickly became clear that they were not attatched to anything, nor were they attatched to each other. i cannot be sure of whether they were stationary or in motion. we drove underneath them, and as we did, i stuck my head through the window for a better look. it was clear that the objects were not stars. if they were in motion, they were headed south toward kent, but this may only have been an illusion caused by the northbound motion of our car. unfortunately we were unable to take a picture or video of the objects, nor were we able to find a place to pull over and get a better look. we continued driving north and soon lost sight of them.
content.summary: Orange lights over ohio route 43

content.detailedDescription:
While out on my balcony, smoking a cigarette, i observed for a very brief moment (not exceeding one second in time), a very bright, white light moving at high speeds. i was not watching the sky specifically, but it did catch my attention while moving along my balcony. (balcony is a ground floor patio). the weather tonight was unremarkable. scattered clouds.

with me facing directly south, it was south east of my position, moving south east (seemingly towards the south beach area). 

it moved at what seemed to be high speeds, at a height that i can only describe as cloud level. obviously without knowing height and distance traveled, it is difficult to understand its speed. but i do believe that it was moving quickly. if i did not misjudge its altitude, then planes are not uncommon at the altitude i witnessed. i'm going to guess the angle of my view, to the object, was about 70 degrees.

i lost track of the object due to a tree obstructing my view. i only saw it briefly before it moved behind the tree, from above it. its path was very direct and unchanging in speed, altitude, and trajectory. i do not believe that it was moving downward, as to land. nor do i believe it was rising.

the only physical description that i can give is it being a round/circular white light, and possibly fainter at its edges. 

as far as description in what it lacks; there was no silhouette to the object witnessed. in miami's light polluted skies, at night you can easily make out a plane's shape. there was no indication of wings, nor the standard red and blue (green?) wing tip lights on a plane. all that could be witnessed was a bright light. the light was not illuminating in a manner to give hint at the object's shape. i cannot recall if the light flashed or blinked, so i will not say positively that it did or did not. if i had to guess, i would say it did not.


personal input - 

i live within 5 blocks of opa locka airport. there is a consistent amount of traffic to this airport including private pilots, commercial (shipping), and military/us coast guard traffic. 

i completely rule out the airport having anything to do with what i saw, and in counter, believe the airport allows me to strengthen my belief that this was not an airplane. with me witnessing planes throughout all times of the day, in all weather, i feel i have a decent grasp of what an airplane looks like, and at night. not moreso than others, but enough.

for this to have been a plane, it had to have an extremely bright light on the rear of the plane. bright enough and large enough to not allow view of the plane's body. 

also, from the angle witnessed, and the object's path, it almost seems as if the light was facing me. i'm not sure if this might indicate that it was not a fixed light on a craft, as much as it was a source of light that was moving. like a moving light bulb.

i was definitely excited when i first saw the object, immediately opening the door to the balcony to announce what i just seen to my family inside. after brief moments though, i realized that my excitement did not allow me to think properly about what i had seen. 

i ruled out helicopters. i then ruled out a meteor, as my understanding is that meteors are visually fire engulfed/fireballs. i'm pretty sure i've seen a meteor before, and a large, tail followed fireball is what i saw.

as time went by, i began to really believe that what i saw was not a normal occurrence. i personally cannot take a guess at what type of craft or meteorological event it could have been, as i can't compare it to anything i know of.

tomorrow i will submit a second report with a digital photo of my point of view of the event, indicating the object's path.
content.summary: Bright, round, white light, high speed

content.detailedDescription: Flying on the plane started seeing thre to four red lights showing than disappearing in the cloud, yet we are 38-40 thousand feet in the air. i take out my camera and start shooting. yet the lights come and go up and down and from red to white. i actually didn't see the big pink one but its hovering over the plane, saw it when i looked at my pictures. left from laguardia to atlanta georgia. flight left at 5:59 pm landed at 8:07 pm.
content.summary: A bunch of red turned white lights trailing the plane for 5 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was driving east on highway 24 leaving fayetteville, north carolina on august 18, 2011 , i was heading home. the time was late after 9:00pm but almost 10:00pm. after i reached the intersection of highway 24 and cedar creek rd, i traveled about a mile on the outskirts of fayetteville, thru 2 intersections. by the time i reached the second intersection, i had passed a large machinery lot with tobaccos and cat ,used in constuction, on my left. and, on my right lots of trees with a break and in the distance you can see a factory like establishment; there were trees also located on the left side of the highway. while i approached the second intersection, it was about 10:00pm, i didn't really have the radio turned up but i was smoking a cigarrette and i noticed a aircraft with 5 round-circular lights shaped in a triangle flying over the trees on the left side of the highway. at first i noticed that it was a large aircraft of some caliber, and paid no attention because i realized the fayetteville airport is located very close by, down highway 301. but, then as it was still on the left side of the highway still with the end of the flying object just coming over the trees, i began to realize that this flying object was in the outline of a geometric triangle with 5 circular-round lights and it was very large. 

my head exploded with questions, all dealing with airplanes or any type of aircraft that could have been in the sky and at that size and caliber and at that time. this obect was a very large triangle in the sky with 5 lights, what appeared to be located at the bottom. the aircraft seemed to blend into the night sky so it looked dark but still dull at the same time, but i can still clearly see a triangle outline shape with a solid texture of a blackish maybe dark grayish color. this obect looked maybe few hundred feet above the highest trees and it looked about a couple hundred feet for each side. the triangle had 3 equal sides so i believe it to be a equilateral triangle. then the 5 lights on the bottom. you had one light in the corner of the point/vertices of the triangle and that was heading in the direction over the highway left-to-right on the road. three more circular lights were located on the opposite straight-side of the triangle, with gaps between each light. then the 5th circular light was located in the very center under the aircraft triangle. this light also seem to have a larger circumference then the other 4 lights. so, starting from the front bottom of the triangle to the back bottom, the lights seem to line up in a ratio of 1-1-3. these lights were round, circular and bright. they appeared to be a constant whitish glowing color, but they didn't blink, flash, or move side-to-side, but more seemed to have a sight blur on the outline of the circle; like looking at jet boosters and seeing the fumes comeout the exhaust. this flying triangle flew at a constant height above the trees and just casually flew over the highway in my sights. if i had to guess, this flying aircraft was roughly about a thousand feet to a few thousand feet away from me and in the air. i asked myself, "can it be a regular us airway's or a delta airplane heading toward the airport, but just flying low?" i answered, "no, i drive down highway 24 all the time to go home and i see regular airplanes flying to the airport at night. the difference was that those airplanes i see normally were in the distant and looked like little specks of lights, shaped like a bird with a nose, wings, and a tail. i would also notice that those airplanes have a red flashing light under the bottom of the plane. but this flying triangle didnt have a red light, and no blinking lights." then i asked myself,"was it a fighter jet or stealth jet?" again i answered no because i pointed out the immediate difference. if it was a fighter jet, i understand they fly low at night sometimes, but i noticed that this flying object made no noise at all. i had my radio off and the window halfway down driving down the highway at around 50-55 mph. normally when i see a jet high in the sky and they pass over, they normally have a loud echo in the sky. and for this triangle to be so huge and appear so large at my distant, i would have expected hearing some type of engine or popeller. i discluded in my mind that it was not a figher jet or stealth jet, because it flew at a constant height and it seemed to hover like a helicopter flying at a constant straight path. but again, this flying triangle was still too large from any helicopter i have ever seen, so i dont believe it to be that either, and i do not think a jet or any airplane that large and visible to my eye, can fly that low without making any sound, and by not going that fast. also to mention the large circular lights on the bottom. 

the flight of motion of the triangle seemed to come from the left side of highway 24 over the highway and onto the right side towards the factory side. i only saw the flying triangle for about 10-15 seconds. as it was flying over the right side, it instantly shocked me, why don't i take a picture. i should have taken a video from the beginning but it didn't click to try and video it. but, i did take a picture. you can see 5 lights in the sky, but since i took it over my dashboard while driving down a highway, the picture is smaller in the distance and set at 1x zoom. you can only see the lights but if you traced a triangle it would be a exact match. i lost the flying triangle after it passed over the right side of the highway.
content.summary: A large triangle shaped-obect with 5 circular lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the wired ny webcam page..This page is refreshed every 30 seconds...Each time i saw diffrent ufos/objects...They were over brooklyn and hovering over the east river..I think that these web-cameras are infarred and thats why it is capturing these objects on the web-site..I'd also say that they are not planes or helicopters because they are traveling so close together and this simply isn't possible, especially after 911...??? they are strange craft and not from earth..!!! i am remaining anonymous from now on because i send in alot of reports and nothing is every done about it....So the hell with it...I'll just post for my fellow man.
content.summary: Ufo's from aug.4th & aug.18th 2011 over brooklyn ny

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the wired ny webcam page..This page is refreshed every 30 seconds...Each time i saw diffrent ufos/objects...They were over brooklyn and hovering over the east river..I think that these web-cameras are infarred and thats why it is capturing these objects on the web-site..I'd also say that they are not planes or helicopters because they are traveling so close together and this simply isn't possible, especially after 911...??? they are strange craft and not from earth..!!!
content.shape: Cigar,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Sphere,   Teardrop,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Ufos over brooklyn,ny

content.detailedDescription:
While traveling southbound on 84th street between bryant road and duffy road in an unincorporated area near slaughterville, oklahoma he observed to the west through the trees three lights ( one large light pulsating with two smaller lights lower on either side. when he came to a clearing where there were no trees he could see the lights clearer.  there was a house in the distance and the lights appeared to be over the top of the house. the center bright light had a blue light circling it. as it passed in front of the bright light it made it look like it was pulsating.  off to either side was a smaller white light and above the bright white light was an occasional flash. when the red light flashed he related that he could see a large gun metal gray triangle shaped object.  the bright light appeared to be in the center of the craft w the other two lights being the ends of the craft. he was able to take one photograph by using his cell phone.  the photo shows the lights only. he related that the size of the craft was the size of a football stadium.  the object left in an unknown direction.


this report was completed by field investigator at witness request.
content.summary: Observed triangle craft w 3 lights

content.detailedDescription:
Pittsburgh pa
i was putting my motorcycle away last night at 9 45 pm when i saw a bright green light overhead. it was on the bottom of a disc that i would say was about 500 feet up moving from southwest to northeast against the prevailing wind. it did not make a sound as it passed over. the whole incident lasted only about 20 seconds. this is not the only time that this has happened to me. i witnessed the same light several years ago with my now ex-wife in this same location. the local tv stations were hit with a number of calls on that particular incident. the disc that i saw last night seemed to be about 40 feet in diameter. i hope that this is of value to you. i have no doubt that it was not of earthly origin.

I was sitting on my porch smoking a cigarette with my girlfriend when she spotted a red oval like object to the east of manhattan and asked me what it was. i looked at the object and stated that it was a blimp over citi field because of the mets game just i finished explaining that it was a blimp we saw it fade away to just a little red light that completely disappeared. i being a skeptic i googled the mets schedule on my phone just to find out that they were not playing at all today. i continued to look at the sky and see the air traffic from laguardia airport in the distance but still saw nothing even with clear skys to the east and thunder and lightning to the west still illuminating the sky.
content.summary: Red oval appeared then faded away

content.detailedDescription: I was southbound on 84th street between duffy and bryant rd in an unincorporated area in slaughterville, oklahoma. while driving i observed to the west one large white spotlight with a blue light circling it and two smaller white objects off to either side. above the white light was a red light that pulsated. when this red light pulsated it lite up the top of the craft. i could see that it was a gun metal gray triangular shaped craft.   i could tell that the white light,the blue light and the red light above were located in the center of the craft. the two smaller white lights were at the corners of the craft.  as i was traveling i observed this through the trees. i stopped a short distance down the road where there was an opening in the trees and there was a farm house in the distance.  it appeared that the craft was hovering over the farm house.  while stopped i was able to take one photograph of the object. the object left in an unknown direction.
content.summary: Saw triangle shaped object above house

content.detailedDescription: 1. in my 2 little brothers back yard with a camera and a telescope,looking for ufo's. 2. we were looking at the moon, and we turned the telescope to the lef alot and found ufo's. after that we were just about to go back inside, but then a large light went over their house and drained our camera when it shined a huge beam over us when it stopped the left. so we were so excited so we went back inside, my brothers were kinda scared. we put it on the computer and made a video of it, check it out, first go to youtube, then search trifle6films and it will say real u.F.O pictures, sadly, we didnt get the ufo above us. 3. we knew instantly it was a ufo because it looked exactly like a ufo and nothing else, just disk like. and at the last pic on the video it transformed into 4 missile looking things. 4. it was disk like, then transformed into 4 missle looking things, an it turned around istantly when it was going to the right, to the left, withough even turning. 5. i was really excited and wanted to look more but my 2 little brothers were scared, so i went in with them so they wouldnt be freaked out. 6. i lost sight of it when it zoomed across the sky.
content.summary: Camera through a telescope and found ufo's then after on hovered across above us with a beam

content.detailedDescription:
While waiting in line to enter the kennedy space center in cape canaveral with my family, i decided to take photos of them and the crowd. while taking the pictures, i saw the astronaut atop the entrance and decided that it would make a great shot(attach. #1). the exact time was 11:30:38:00 am according to the time on my camera.

it was several days before i downloaded the photos to my computer to make a cd for my grandson. i enlarged the photograph and cropped it to just get the astronaut and make a second photo (attach. #2). it was at this time while scanning across the picture that i saw the glowing dot. when i looked at the original photo, the gold dot was visible to the naked eye. 

at this time, i decided to enlarge the section with the gold dot and thought it might be an airplane or the space station (attach. #3). i have never seen an airplane that high glow with such brilliance.

the three photographs are attached as i enlarged and cropped them to make more pictures. if you take the original picture and divide it into quarters, the gold dot is in the upper right quadrant, three quarters from the right edge. it is near the cloud.

i have no idea if i took something interesting or just plain ordinary but felt very excited. what i would like to know is if there were any flights over the area on that day at that exact time, or if the space station happened to be visible on that day at that time. if so, then i have a great shot of it.

my husband is just as curious. we were very excited to get a shot like this.
content.summary: Took pictures at kennedy space center. after downloading to my computer, i noticed and object in the sky that my camera had captured but i did not notice at the time. this visitation was just prior to the last shuttle launch.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of november 15th, opening day of deer rifle season, the year 1997, i was camped out in my van about a mile across from the cellular phone tower outside of deep water mo. it had snowed slightly in the early morning hours, barely an inch. the daytime temp. was in the teens. after a fruitless day of hunting i retired to my van to grab a bite to eat and warm myself with some hot coffee. as it gets dark by 5:45pm, i was just sitting in the van in a pull in, facing a growed up field imagining that a big buck would cross into my view. the old boy i was after. as one has nothing much to do but plot out the next days plans, i was just thinking of my game plan. while looking out my side window through leaves near a tree i was parked next to, i noticed some lights in the distant sky shining off and on. and now my story begins in all earnesty. i am i think a man's man. i do not fear much on this earth, yet what i was about to have happen to me, being mentally unprepared, would change my way of thinking and/or life forever! i grabbed my binoculars, wallet, and a 9mm pistol i had, not wanting to leave them in the van. i put my pistol in my waist holster, and my coat on to step out in the road to view what i thought was a helicopter about 3/4 to 1 mile away over the dark treeline. as i couldn't quite make out the lights flashing on this object too well, i walked down the road to where it curbs about 70 yards from the van. the road heads out to my left towards the communication tower mentioned earlier, behind me it ends at some rocky bluffs that people like to fish alot from, towards hw 13 out of clinton, mo. when i focused my nikon 8x40 binoculars on the object again, with and without my glasses, i could just make out what appeared to be a dish like form, a red flashing light on the middle top, and what looked like strobe lights flasing in the middle of the object in a circular and uniform manner. i could not hear any sound at that distance, but looking at the object and judging its movement if any against the dark tree line, i came to the conclusion it was hovering and/or stationary. i did think this was odd for a helicopter to be in that area and no sound whatsoever. and in that frame of mind, all i was doing was wondering what could be the purpose. little knowing that my quiet evening was to take a sci-fi turn out of a movie! as i was just standing watching this object, i happened to look to my left, down that section of county road, possibly 1/4 mile in length and was shocked to see a blue like, lazer beam of light come from the sw horizen and make a 90 degree drop straight down to the earth, which seemed to be at the end of the road i was standing on. standing on mind you! i may have not put as much thought into what the disk like object i was looking at seconds ago, to be no more than some sort of man made craft, helicopter, etc, but this lazer light as you can guess made me take a very profound interest in what was happening around me in the star filled, cold, dark heavens! i gazed intently in the direction of that beam of light which made no sound, yet didn't see anything. i then put my binoculars on the disk like object and saw that it was still in the same area and still flashing its lights the same as before. after what seemed like 5 minutes, out of the corner of my left eye, another blueish lazer beam of light appeared from the same area of the horizon from the sw as the 1st beam, and in the blink of an eye it stopped halfway down the road, above the tree line next to the road i was standing in. i can only describe this orb as one might say to be somewhat egg shaped,fuzzy in color, white around the edge, with a pilot flame like bluish tint of color, taking up 80% of the middle diameter. the hair went up on my neck and head as it very slowly, yet quietly seem to be floating down the tree line towards me! i seemed to instantly forget that i had a fully loaded 9mm pistol in the back of my waist! i was very proficient with this firearm, yet the fear that seemed to overcome me made me even lose touch with the very ground i stood on. i was as one might say, revitted in place. i quickly looked back at the disk and it was still there doing the same thing as before. in turning quickly back to watch the orb float towards me down the tree line, i tried to judge its size by taking my hand and encircling it with my fingers, i judged it to be at arms length about the size of a golf ball or slightly larger. in the process of doing this i also judged the height above to treeline to what one might think as 40 ft.Or so. i cannot safely say that this orb was directly over the tree line or just behind it. but it was in full view. after getting this info in my head it had closed the distance to me by more than halfway. by then it looked to be the size of a baseball! to say i was getting worried is an unearthly understatement! then out of the same sw horizon another lazer like beam, and a 2nd orb lines up directly behind the first orb! possibly 100 ft. or so apart. they both are floating along silently still coming towards me. as they near the end of the tree line, the curve i am standing in has a field road cutting into a grown up field that lays across their path, this i am nearly facing, although slightly to the left as i am understandably watching their immenant progress towards me. all of a sudden, in the blink of an eye, the 2nd orb behind the 1st orb, drops down underneath and is directly lined up as if tied together both silently coming on. i cup my ears and hear nothing, no humming, nothing! as they both cross the opening directly across from me, an incredibly bright, neon green, "v" shaped light seems to light up the star filled night sky where i had no view of anything but that light in that split second. in that light i just snapped a photo in my minds eye, was what seemed to look like a unbroken smoke ring, much as a feather would look like descending to the ground. how anyone could not possibly see this from hw 13 over the grand river arm of the lake is beyond me. but in that light i did not see either of the orbs. but as soon as the light was gone, what i assumed to be the 1st orb was slowly continuing that same path over the treeline to my right. it started to slightly veer upwards at a 45 degree angle and as it was in the direction as the disk further away, which i had not looked at for obvious reasons, i took a quick look and the disk shaped object was moving away over the far tree line in the general direction of clinton,mo. much the speed as a helicopter would. as i then looked back and up at the orb it was still at a 45 degree angle and all at once, like the starship enterprise of tv fame, it left in the only way i can see and think it! (in warp drive) to infinity and beyond! a blue lazer like tail, with the orb at the front, which move so quickly, that the tail was taken along with it and it looked to take its place in the stars of the universe and become a star! that is the only way i can describe how fast it moved and how long i saw it.

after watching and going thru all of this, what seemed to be an afterthought was that next to that 2nd tree line to my right was a parked, datson like truck with a camper shell on it. i never noticed this before or fully forgot about it as the night sky was filled with these happenings! i was hoping someone was there in that area with me and had maybe viewed the same things i had. i was truly hoping that i wasn't by myself out there as i had this feeing after the bright neon green light filled the night sky, something had landed. how far away, i had no idea! maybe someone was sleeping in the truck, in the back of the bed. i told myself to stay calm and go to the truck and look around, and if i saw them in the cab, as i had a small mini-mag light, to light my way to them to show i was there. but what if there was no one there? i eased up to the cab, covered the light just enough to look inside, and saw blaze orange apparel and a hunting rifle. could this person have gone into town with friends? was he sleeping in the back? i took a chance hoping i wouldn't be thought of as someone out to rob them or do some other mischeif, and called out quietly to ask if any one was in the truck! a 2nd time, no response. damn my luck! it was then that i knew i wasn't myself. i did not have control of my emotions. i knew what i had to say, and as i used the light to tap on the bed of the truck, i heard someone stir. then a man asked me what i wanted? i at first tried to tell him that i wasn't drinking, nor smoking weed, but there was something happening out here in the sky and i would like him to look with me to prove to myself that it had happened as i saw it, if it was to keep on happening. i could not talk straight to him. my words came jumbled and run together out of my mouth, i was shaking like a leaf! it was fear! never had i ever experianced that kind of emotion! i can still think of that moment and relive those thoughts today. albeit with less intensity. the man came out, i cannot remember his name, and talked with me and we watched the sky for over an hour, but the lights were gone. it took that long and possibly longer talking with him to feel myself actually touch the ground again. i know not his name, nor ever saw him again, but will always be thankful he was there to calm me down. he mentioned he flew back in the 50's and/or 60's and he and his co-pilot would see things as ufo's but not go thru the trouble of reporting as it would cause them problems with the airline they flew for. and that is the end of my story. i hope it will be usefull to others, and the only thing i would like to see is for someone to put on video what i saw and let others see and/or relive what i or they might have seen also!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A disk, 2 orbs, and a laser light show!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of november 15th, opening day of deer rifle season, the year 1997, i was camped out in my van about a mile across from the cellular phone tower outside of deep water mo. it had snowed slightly in the early morning hours, barely an inch. the daytime temp. was in the teens. after a fruitless day of hunting i retired to my van to grab a bite to eat and warm myself with some hot coffee. as it gets dark by 5:45pm, i was just sitting in the van in a pull in, facing a growed up field imagining that a big buck would cross into my view. the old boy i was after. as one has nothing much to do but plot out the next days plans, i was just thinking of my game plan. while looking out my side window through leaves near a tree i was parked next to, i noticed some lights in the distant sky shining off and on. and now my story begins in all earnesty. i am i think a man's man. i do not fear much on this earth, yet what i was about to have happen to me, being mentally unprepared, would change my way of thinking and/or life forever! i grabbed my binoculars, wallet, and a 9mm pistol i had, not wanting to leave them in the van. i put my pistol in my waist holster, and my coat on to step out in the road to view what i thought was a helicopter about 3/4 to 1 mile away over the dark treeline. as i couldn't quite make out the lights flashing on this object too well, i walked down the road to where it curbs about 70 yards from the van. the road heads out to my left towards the communication tower mentioned earlier, behind me it ends at some rocky bluffs that people like to fish alot from, towards hw 13 out of clinton, mo. when i focused my nikon 8x40 binoculars on the object again, with and without my glasses, i could just make out what appeared to be a dish like form, a red flashing light on the middle top, and what looked like strobe lights flasing in the middle of the object in a circular and uniform manner. i could not hear any sound at that distance, but looking at the object and judging its movement if any against the dark tree line, i came to the conclusion it was hovering and/or stationary. i did think this was odd for a helicopter to be in that area and no sound whatsoever. and in that frame of mind, all i was doing was wondering what could be the purpose. little knowing that my quiet evening was to take a sci-fi turn out of a movie! as i was just standing watching this object, i happened to look to my left, down that section of county road, possibly 1/4 mile in length and was shocked to see a blue like, lazer beam of light come from the sw horizen and make a 90 degree drop straight down to the earth, which seemed to be at the end of the road i was standing on. standing on mind you! i may have not put as much thought into what the disk like object i was looking at seconds ago, to be no more than some sort of man made craft, helicopter, etc, but this lazer light as you can guess made me take a very profound interest in what was happening around me in the star filled, cold, dark heavens! i gazed intently in the direction of that beam of light which made no sound, yet didn't see anything. i then put my binoculars on the disk like object and saw that it was still in the same area and still flashing its lights the same as before. after what seemed like 5 minutes, out of the corner of my left eye, another blueish lazer beam of light appeared from the same area of the horizon from the sw as the 1st beam, and in the blink of an eye it stopped halfway down the road, above the tree line next to the road i was standing in. i can only describe this orb as one might say to be somewhat egg shaped,fuzzy in color, white around the edge, with a pilot flame like bluish tint of color, taking up 80% of the middle diameter. the hair went up on my neck and head as it very slowly, yet quietly seem to be floating down the tree line towards me! i seemed to instantly forget that i had a fully loaded 9mm pistol in the back of my waist! i was very proficient with this firearm, yet the fear that seemed to overcome me made me even lose touch with the very ground i stood on. i was as one might say, revitted in place. i quickly looked back at the disk and it was still there doing the same thing as before. in turning quickly back to watch the orb float towards me down the tree line, i tried to judge its size by taking my hand and encircling it with my fingers, i judged it to be at arms length about the size of a golf ball or slightly larger. in the process of doing this i also judged the height above to treeline to what one might think as 40 ft.Or so. i cannot safely say that this orb was directly over the tree line or just behind it. but it was in full view. after getting this info in my head it had closed the distance to me by more than halfway. by then it looked to be the size of a baseball! to say i was getting worried is an unearthly understatement! then out of the same sw horizon another lazer like beam, and a 2nd orb lines up directly behind the first orb! possibly 100 ft. or so apart. they both are floating along silently still coming towards me. as they near the end of the tree line, the curve i am standing in has a field road cutting into a grown up field that lays across their path, this i am nearly facing, although slightly to the left as i am understandably watching their immenant progress towards me. all of a sudden, in the blink of an eye, the 2nd orb behind the 1st orb, drops down underneath and is directly lined up as if tied together both silently coming on. i cup my ears and hear nothing, no humming, nothing! as they both cross the opening directly across from me, an incredibly bright, neon green, "v" shaped light seems to light up the star filled night sky where i had no view of anything but that light in that split second. in that light i just snapped a photo in my minds eye, was what seemed to look like a unbroken smoke ring, much as a feather would look like descending to the ground. how anyone could not possibly see this from hw 13 over the grand river arm of the lake is beyond me. but in that light i did not see either of the orbs. but as soon as the light was gone, what i assumed to be the 1st orb was slowly continuing that same path over the treeline to my right. it started to slightly veer upwards at a 45 degree angle and as it was in the direction as the disk further away, which i had not looked at for obvious reasons, i took a quick look and the disk shaped object was moving away over the far tree line in the general direction of clinton,mo. much the speed as a helicopter would. as i then looked back and up at the orb it was still at a 45 degree angle and all at once, like the starship enterprise of tv fame, it left in the only way i can see and think it! (in warp drive) to infinity and beyond! a blue lazer like tail, with the orb at the front, which move so quickly, that the tail was taken along with it and it looked to take its place in the stars of the universe and become a star! that is the only way i can describe how fast it moved and how long i saw it.

after watching and going thru all of this, what seemed to be an afterthought was that next to that 2nd tree line to my right was a parked, datson like truck with a camper shell on it. i never noticed this before or fully forgot about it as the night sky was filled with these happenings! i was hoping someone was there in that area with me and had maybe viewed the same things i had. i was truly hoping that i wasn't by myself out there as i had this feeing after the bright neon green light filled the night sky, something had landed. how far away, i had no idea! maybe someone was sleeping in the truck, in the back of the bed. i told myself to stay calm and go to the truck and look around, and if i saw them in the cab, as i had a small mini-mag light, to light my way to them to show i was there. but what if there was no one there? i eased up to the cab, covered the light just enough to look inside, and saw blaze orange apparel and a hunting rifle. could this person have gone into town with friends? was he sleeping in the back? i took a chance hoping i wouldn't be thought of as someone out to rob them or do some other mischeif, and called out quietly to ask if any one was in the truck! a 2nd time, no response. damn my luck! it was then that i knew i wasn't myself. i did not have control of my emotions. i knew what i had to say, and as i used the light to tap on the bed of the truck, i heard someone stir. then a man asked me what i wanted? i at first tried to tell him that i wasn't drinking, nor smoking weed, but there was something happening out here in the sky and i would like him to look with me to prove to myself that it had happened as i saw it, if it was to keep on happening. i could not talk straight to him. my words came jumbled and run together out of my mouth, i was shaking like a leaf! it was fear! never had i ever experianced that kind of emotion! i can still think of that moment and relive those thoughts today. albeit with less intensity. the man came out, i cannot remember his name, and talked with me and we watched the sky for over an hour, but the lights were gone. it took that long and possibly longer talking with him to feel myself actually touch the ground again. i know not his name, nor ever saw him again, but will always be thankful he was there to calm me down. he mentioned he flew back in the 50's and/or 60's and he and his co-pilot would see things as ufo's but not go thru the trouble of reporting as it would cause them problems with the airline they flew for. and that is the end of my story. i hope it will be usefull to others, and the only thing i would like to see is for someone to put on video what i saw and let others see and/or relive what i or they might have seen also!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A disk, 2 orbs, and a laser light show!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I have many parrots i take outside throughout the day and so my eyes are always on the sky looking for predators in efforts to keep my parrots safe.After dark a go out for a smoke a few times before bed and still at times look up for shooting stars and constellations.After the second time out on 8/17/11 i saw one bright star like object i didn't recognise in that area of the sky at that time of night. on second glance, it moved in a direction toward the center of the sky. the object was over a mile high and blended with the stars. while watching as i move across the sky, it gained speed and left the atmosphere; i know this because it faded off into the distance, tho the distance was the center of the sky and the light got dimmer.I videoed the first sighting, and the camera only recorded blackness.As i gave up on the camera on my phone, i called my mother to tell her, as i did i saw a second one of same hight in a separate part of the sky and it did the same thing in a completely different part of the sky at different angle.I dismissed both events as a result of reading about the new changes of flight options for space and nasa, (being that i've never seen so it could be a what it was) then on second thought today, i decided that their was nothing about these kinds of abilities nor anything about take-off's two in the same 15 min.

im reporting this being that i'm thinking that ufo's are real now, after this the 3rd sighting and no pictures or video of the one im reporting, tho i do have video of the first one i saw in high point nc
i havent let anyone see it other then family 
i kept both videos on my iphone and can prove that one
i just hop im not the only one that saw these events
thanks
content.summary: Two objects leaving atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I���ve been watching the skies for quite some time. being an ex military bomb tec. who's primary job was to load the weapons on just about any military aircraft around, so naturally i have a natural knack to look up at the skies. well recently i have been noticing helicoptor-ish air craft in the air at night, now not all nights but most nights. well i noticed that these certain aircraft would spend long amounts of time just hovering in spot, i noticed they "flashed in a certain way" and that there lights would completely change when another aircraft in the sky approached. now where i live i am in quite an active air space as i am not far from a major airport. but it seems odd for these strange aircraft to just "hang around". not to mention it costs around $3000 and hour to keep any type of aircraft like that in the air let alone several. so naturally i assumed them to be government aircraft looking for marijuana growers. well one night i was out side around ten o'clock, and i was bringing my dog in of the line. when i stopped and noticed that there where three of these in the air that night. i noticed one beginning to travel to my left having been interested in these for quite some time i made the not so bright decision to flash my green led flashlight at it and quickly vanish from sight. shortly after the other two started to travel in opposite directions. one to the left {almost the same but not quite the same path as the previous} and one to the right. within seconds i could hardly keep my eyes on both without turning my head from side to side. then i began to have an interesting feeling, so i turned around and no more then fifty feet above my house was emerging a strange triangular aircraft. it was dull in color and seemed to have the front wing span flush with the front of the air craft. the wings had a red and blue light on the front outside edges. and in the very front there was a strange faint "tracing back and forth light" in the very front right below what would have been the cockpit. all the while it never made a sound. i ran as fast as i could and got under the safety of my front door and out of the view of the strange craft. i immediately began to yell for my wife, who of course at the time heard nothing. after several seconds "which seemed like eternity" of me yelling and noticing the craft was just hovering above the house, i made the decision to go get my wife. better to have a witness right. upon getting her to the do the craft had began moving again and was now about 100 feet away and headed out over the field behind our house. shortly after it was joined by the other two and they all sailed out of sight.....   after five years in the military i have worked with all kinds of aircraft and all i can sat is well... lets just say the next day my wife went out and bought a shot gun. they still appear quite regularly, nothing as close though, just waiting... the ball is in there court.
content.summary: Strange aircraft flew over house, hovered, then continued flight all the while never making a sound.

content.detailedDescription: Went out side with night vision after midnight to look for u.F.O. disk seen on aug.5th. 2011. just after midnight. pointed night vision to south west of south tree in back yard. and immediately saw round disk hovering in the air about 1/2 mile to a mile above ground level. it must have noticed me looking at it again. it was hovering almost vertical this time. and after seeing bottom of disk it turned as too see side veiw as if it were looking at me. it shot back and forth as trying too loose my sight of it. it took off too the east and dissapeared. came bock across to the east. went behind east tree, then came back out looked at me again. (side veiw) hovered to the left. and stopped moved at the speed of light to the left and right leaving a light trail. like it was frustrated that i could still see it as well as follow it with the night vision. the sky was cloud coverd 100% so craft would go into clouds then come back out after a few minutes. 2 friends just showed up at my home so i yelled for them too come to me and look thruogh my night vision to see this disk. we all took turns watching it. it hovered around went into clouds would return. hover, for the next 20 min. untill it finally left. so far i have had three eye wittness accounts above my home in the last 4 weeks. there certainly is alot of activity around here. must come and see. i'm sure it will be back, more than i know i beleive.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was hovering above to the right of south tree, 4 wittnesses/night vision

content.detailedDescription: Went out side with night vision after midnight to look for u.F.O. disk seen on aug.5th. 2011. just after midnight. pointed night vision to south west of south tree in back yard. and immediately saw round disk hovering in the air about 1/2 mile to a mile above ground level. it must have noticed me looking at it again. it was hovering almost vertical this time. and after seeing bottom of disk it turned as too see side veiw as if it were looking at me. it shot back and forth as trying too loose my sight of it. it took off too the east and dissapeared. came bock across to the east. went behind east tree, then came back out looked at me again. (side veiw) hovered to the left. and stopped moved at the speed of light to the left and right leaving a light trail. like it was frustrated that i could still see it as well as follow it with the night vision. the sky was cloud coverd 100% so craft would go into clouds then come back out after a few minutes. 2 friends just showed up at my home so i yelled for them too come to me and look thruogh my night vision to see this disk. we all took turns watching it. it hovered around went into clouds would return. hover, for the next 20 min. untill it finally left. so far i have had three eye wittness accounts above my home in the last 4 weeks. there certainly is alot of activity around here. must come and see. i'm sure it will be back, more than i know i beleive.

content.summary: Was hovering above to the right of south tree, 4 wittnesses/night vision

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside with my dog at about 2230 on august 13, 2011. there had been severe thunderstorms in the area and it was beginning to clear up somewhat. a full moon was breaking through the clouds and when i looked up in the sky to see if other clouds were breaking up i observed the following;

a bright white light that was round sort of like a flashlight beam was shining through the clouds close to the moon. as the clouds moved the light stayed with them but it was moving around in no particular pattern. it would move very quickly and stayed with the clouds, it never moved away from the clouds. i noticed that it wouldn't come out into the clear sky and i knew this couldn't be a spotlight because there wasn't any type of leading trail from the light. i went inside my house and asked my wife to come outside and look for herself and when she saw the light she was scared. i told her i didn't think it was going to hurt us but she was getting nervous.

after a few minutes a young man who was about 20 years old was walking on our street in the subdivision (neighborhood) and as he walked toward our house my wife got his attention and asked him if he could see the "light" and he said "wow what is that"?  i told him i did't know what it was and i asked him to explain what he see's and he said the same thing i did. it was a circular light hovering above the clouds moving around in erratic patterns, no other air traffic was present. 

we live in a very rural area and there are no street lights on the highway adjacent to my house and no aircraft could be seen anywhere. the first thing i did was to look for other aircraft and like i said none was present.

i am 51 years old a retired navy senior chief petty officer(e8), i became a navy airwarfare specialist in 1982 and have seen nearly every modern day aircraft the us military has in it's arsenal. there are no aircraft that i know of that could do what the light did. i am also a retired city/local police officer and i have a total of 27 years of military and civilian law experience. 

this is true to the best of my knowledge and the first time in my life that i have ever seen anything like this.
content.summary: Round shaped light

content.detailedDescription:
my fishing buddy and i left phoenix and arrived at his fishing honey hole at 4:10 in the afternoon for night fishing. we both observed the following at around 9:30 that same night. the moon had just bridged the horizon in the east above the overcast eastern sky. i was a little disappointed it was so bright ( poor fishin ) a commercial jet was between us and the clouds apparently heading blue and white west. still had his landing light on. didn't get larger didn't get smaller. my buddy said " you know that light hasn't moved in a spell ". i am a kidder and tried to make light of it. i pointed behind us to the south and said " not to worry aliens only attack from the south !" a joke..We both looked and sequentially one after another four in total came to a stop, went from blue and red flashing lights to a miniature sun burst. left a circular mist, smoke, vapor and a red spherical light acompanied this white light not noticed before or after 1, then the second then the third and the fourth. this occurred thre times once in the south once in the east and once in the west the most spectacular. they were closer i could see it wasn't one light but four semetrically placed in the shape of a square flashing red only and the four lights split vertically into two groups of two one light above the other, bright white flash red ball next to it circular smoke. gone . this went on periodically over 2-1/2 hours.
independent flights u- turns stationary positions lights on lights out.
no camera and i don't expect anyone reading this to give it any creedence.
i am 61 yrs old. i always wanted to see something but never in my life have i ever seen anything like that. i have witnessed something i have no answer for and i am a pilot. my neck was so sore from looking up in the sky. i will always wonder and never look at the sky in the same way again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Single craft and synchronized craft.  watched for 2-1/2 hrs fly a supersonic speed then stop one at a time ( four in total ) synchronous
content.locationName: 47 mi east of CA border, Arizona

content.detailedDescription: On sunday august 14 approx 1230-100am we were outside hoping to catch a glimps of a remainder of a meteor showers but did not see any. then all of a sudden i noticed a circle type objects appear from nowhere moving across the skys and all of a sudden just disappear. this was wierd because the objects were moving from west to east and the area they were in was clear skys . i live in a area were its not uncommon to see planes and their lights but this was no plane and for sure no meteor that i have seen it did not leave a trail of any type. it was clearly two orangish color cicle objects at a high rate of spee... i yelled to my friend and pointed in the direction and when they were trying to see what i pointed at they disappeared in a clear sky.  weird. i will never see something like this again.
content.summary: Observed 2 circle type objects appear from nowhere and travelled and gone in less than 5 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Same as above
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw 5 disc shaped ufo's flying close to mtn. home air force base . after about 5 minutes the crafts turned and flew straight up until they went out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
On the 31st of july my boyfriend and i were outside around 10:30 at night. i saw what, at first, i thought was a shooting star. i pointed it out to him and we both watched it move across the sky and get dimmer and brighter. it seemed to be at a pretty high altitude, but hard to say with no size reference to compare it to. we continued to watch it for about 30-45 seconds until it completely faded away. thought it was kinda odd. but then another one popped up in the sky, in a completely different spot. it didn't move in a straight pattern this time. it moved up and down left and right at a pretty steady pace. not fast, not slow. almost like a cruising like matter you'd see an airplane travel at. mind you there were no flashing lights. just one solid light that was white, like a star. hence why i thought at first it was a shooting star. we watched it until it faded away as well. then again, a third one pops up in a completely different spot and does the same thing. gets really bright and moves around until it fades away to nothing. we definitely thought it was strange but didn't have any explanation. the next night august 1st, around 10:30 again, i was outside and out of the corner of my eye i caught a light flash in the sky. it was exactly like what we had seen the night before. i watched it travel across the sky until it faded completely. i stayed outside to watch a little longer but didn't see any other lights. the next night august 2nd, again around 10:30, i was again, outside when this time i was looking to the sky to see if i'd catch a glimpse of the lights. and to my "not so much surprise" i seen another light!! by this point my mind is blown and i'm really wishing my boyfriend was out there to witness the lights with me again. i had told a couple people about it and every night i would watch the sky to see if there were any more lights. but there was nothing.

last night (mind you this was at 10:00pm last night august 17th) my best friend and neighbor calls me and asks if i can hear the helicopter outside flying around. apparently they were looking for someone because they had their spot light on looking in all the back yards. (this is the nw blvd/maple-ash neighborhood) when i came out i looked up and seen what i thought was the helicopter. i say to my friend that i don't see its spotlight. she then directs me to the south where the helicopter was when all along i was looking at the bright light "flying" around in the northern sky. i am then very excited and tell her to come look at the bright light, explaining to her that its just like what i had seen earlier in the month. we watched it fly around until it faded away completely. we sat outside and started talking about how strange the light was when another one pops up out of nowhere in the northeastern sky. our older kids (10 and 12yrs) come outside wondering why we've been gone so long. so we start explaining to them whats up. when yet again another light pops up in the sky. my best friend goes inside to get her camera so we can try and capture some of this. me and the boys see yet another one moving from west to east, the light got really bright, stopped, then descended to what looks like, from our position, to be about the felts field/valley area. hard to say from our viewpoint exactly. anyways, while it descended, it started pulsating red and orange. we watched it until it slowly drop out of the sky until it was out of our view. by this point we're really tripping out! (we never heard any booms though, always silent) we sat out there and continued to watch the "lights in the sky" until about 11:00. there were too many to count. had to be dozens of different lights. some individual and some in groups. some travel in the exact same flight pattern as the one before it, some are completely random. some blink on and off. some are just really dim like the light you'd see when a satellite moves across the sky, and some are extremely bright!

to me they're ufo's... now that does not mean its aliens but it sure as hell does mean they're unidentified!!! the best way i can describe them is, they look like stars at first, then they get really bright, and travel across the sky in no particular pattern and fade away until you can't see them with your naked eye anymore. they do not fly in straight lines every time either. some do, but others move from left to right then up and down then back to the left again. very strange. going out tonight to try and catch this on video.! really hoping for clear skies tonight!!

there were many reports and a lot of talk on our local news stations facebook pages last night, 8/17/2011 and today, 8/18/2011, about a bright light seen over the spokane valley that fell from the sky and a huge boom that shook people out of their homes to the streets to investigate. the light that we seen descending from the sky, pulsating orange and red is approximately the same time as the reports from the valley. coincidence? there is currently no explanation to what these witnesses in the valley experienced.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Multiple lights seen over spokane on 4 different nights

content.summary: Blue is ours silver is ? silver trainer .Blue is trainee  they do connect or so close they appear that way

content.detailedDescription: Iv been seeing orbs stationed in the foothills of ojai i scope out the rock formations for anything out of the ordenary then i see one or two orbs standing out blending in to the other rocks. this is north of ojai to the southern foot hill of ojai on black mountian on the north side there is a opening a tunnall that iv seen ships flying in and out then it like a brush moves over the tunnal then its like its never there. in matellijia canyon there is a whole bunch of ufos on the ground in the mountians in tunnals and hideing under brush witch i can see part of them.As i get closer to them they make sounds or fluttering sounds the kind that make you stop dead in your tracks. when i come upon them i feel that i should not go to close to them i feel that they are frighten of being seen that they want to be alone but why am i able to see them in the first plase why are they letting me see them all i can do is to keep serching for them and keep in touch with mufon thanks mark mellein.I took 3 pictures of the orb that was there then is gone
content.summary: A realy big wight glowing orb was stationed in betwine two realy big rocks  at top of a ridge four days latter  it was gone a week latter its gone

content.detailedDescription:
Location; santa rosa, california
time; dusk (sun had just gone below the horizon)
date; 1995

 myself and two friends were standing in his driveway, engaged in casual conversation. one 

of my friends had a new flashlight that used hi intensity white led's and was showing us how 

bright it was. at that time, a small passenger airplane similar to a piper cub had just 

taken off from the sonoma county airport a few miles away and was headed in a south easterly 

direction at an altitude of approximatly 1000 feet abs. 
 he then pointed the flashlight at the airplane and jokingly said, "hey, look, a ufo." at 

that moment, a large very bright orb seemed to exit the tail of the plane or appear from 

behind it. it then seemed to float lazily behind the plane, but not actually following it. 

it then began to gain altitude rapidly and finally disappeared out of sight. from the time 

it appeared to the time it was no longer visible was about 3 minutes.
 all the time we remained silent as we watched it. when it was gone, we all looked at each 

other and each asked the same question and each replied with the same answer.
 "did you see that?"
 "yes."
 nothing was said after that by any of us as we all three just walked away, shaking our 

heads.
 i, or either of the other two have any idea what this was, and was never spoke of again. by 

no means was the flashlight in question powerfull enough to place an orb of light in the 

sky, as it was powered by three triple a batteries.
 this is the first time i have told anyone about this.
content.summary: Orb of light
